name: Purple Worm
movement: 50 ft. walking speed, 30 ft. burrowing speed
description: The Purple Worm is a gigantic, segmented monstrosity that measures up to 80 feet long, with rows of sharp teeth lining its massive maw. Its body is capable of burrowing through solid rock, leaving a large tunnel behind.
memorable: Purple Worms are apex predators of the Underdark, feared for their ability to swallow creatures whole and their relentless hunting style.
goals: To hunt and consume creatures found in the Underdark, using their burrowing powers to navigate and surprise prey.
relations: Often encountered alone, but can be found in areas inhabited by other subterranean creatures.
environment: Primarily inhabits the Underdark, tunneling through earth and rock.
strengths: Impressive physical strength with a high attack and damage output; immune to exhaustion and fear.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity, making it vulnerable to agile opponents.
attacks: Uses a powerful bite that can swallow creatures as well as a stinger attack that inflicts piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to swallow creatures whole, dealing ongoing acid damage and removing them from the battlefield.
senses: Has blindsight for 30 feet and tremorsense for 60 feet, allowing it to detect movement effectively.
additional_information: Can create 10-foot diameter tunnels when burrowing.
Has a thrashing attack that can damage multiple nearby foes.
Ability to regain hit points from swallowed creatures.
Relatively high Constitution making it durable in combat.
Uses its burrowing ability for both ambush and escape.
test_queries: massive underground predator with burrowing abilities
giant worm that swallows creatures whole
Apex predator found in the Underdark
hulking creature with devastating melee attacks
